thread.title_full: FACEBOOK RESTORES POSTING BY HUMAN RIGHTS ACTIVIST HAN HUI HUI

author: farhan
title: FACEBOOK RESTORES POSTING BY HUMAN RIGHTS ACTIVIST HAN HUI HUI
text:
FACEBOOK RESTORES POSTING BY HUMAN RIGHTS ACTIVIST HAN HUI HUI   2:02pm 
Human rights activist Han Hui Hui has successfully petitioned Facebook to restore her posting about the inhumane treatment of prisoners in Singapore prisons, which was deleted because of IBs who reported her post without reason. 
Facebook had banned her from posting for 12 hours because of their incessant reporting of her account and post. Advertisement 
Read our previous article here: http://www.allsingaporestuff.com/article/facebook-spore-censors-postings... 
Read her message to human rights defenders here: 
"Facebook has restored my original posting; however, all previous shares were deleted. One particular sharing was by Singaporean cartoonist, Leslie Chew: 
Leslie Chew, who is copied in this email, was a Singaporean cartoonist arrested for making cartoons about the situation that Singaporeans face. For that, he was being arrested, handcuffed, interrogated, house raided, passport seized and was on island arrest. His website is as follow: https://www.facebook.com/DemoncraticSingapore/ 
We would like you to share the plight that Singaporeans who have stepped forward face."
